channel.title: Teleporting issue, doesn't update everyone else
channel.description:
Say you teleport somewhere, on your screen it shows you where you teleported to. but on another players screen it shows you walking around without ever teleporting?
ALSO: this only happens when your in the same area as the other player watching you..
Cheezescape.

item.title: Teleporting issue, doesn't update everyone else
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

TheCyberMan:

make the person’s appearance update true when they teleport.

Already did that :\

Read full topic
item.source: Teleporting issue, doesn't update everyone else
